Summary: A clear cirle with a white light inside
trends: There have been no other sightings in Belmont
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home from work on the expressway. Cars were backing up on the expressway due to a ballgame in town. As I was slowing down a clear ball with a white light inside came from the NW directly at the front of my car and almost bounced off and went directly right to the East. I came home and told my husband my story and he said I looked scared. I said that I was because it was the strangest thing I've ever seen. Hense my search to see if anyone else has every seen such a thing or am I going crazy? Freaky, freaky, freaky!!!
